statements: UPDATE facial_recognition_logs SET confidence_score = 0.85 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE facial_recognition_logs SET detected_emotion = 'Happy', timestamp = '2022-08-15 12:30:00' WHERE log_id = 100;
UPDATE facial_recognition_logs SET detected_emotion='Happy', confidence_score=0.85 WHERE user_id=123 AND log_id=456;
UPDATE facial_recognition_logs SET image_path='/images/user123.jpg', detected_emotion='Angry' WHERE user_id=456 AND timestamp='2022-10-01 08:30:00';
UPDATE facial_recognition_logs SET user_id = 1001, timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00', image_data = '\x00FFAABB' WHERE log_id = 101;
